name: Krampus: Scary Game
description:
Good children are visited by Santa Claus at Christmas.
Bad children are visited by Krampus!

Have fun in this great scary horror game where you need to defeat a powerful monster that is looking for you all over the scene.

You are in Jimy's shoes, a teenager who hasn't behaved this year, you need to be smart to survive while Krampus hunts him down in this horror game.

Krampus is a terrible monster that will hunt you all the time, solve puzzles and look for a way to survive.

Hide to go unnoticed.

Find out how to defeat Krampus by solving puzzles

A great home for you to explore and have fun

Joystick settings, play it your way

Enjoy excellent environmental sounds and graphics

Recommendation: Play with headphones to enhance the gaming experience.

This game contains advertisements.
